articles.author: GERALD IMRAY
articles.title: South Africa's election could bring the biggest political shift since it became a democracy in 1994 - The Associated Press
articles.description: South Africans will vote Wednesday to decide whether their country takes its most significant political step since it brought down apartheid and achieved democracy 30 years ago. This national election will not be as momentous as the one South Africa held in 1…
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) South Africans will vote Wednesday to decide whether their country will take its most significant political step since the moment 30 years ago when it brought down aparth… [+5740 chars]
